events.name: server__data_NextSecret
events.comment: App authentification ID. (Encrypted.)

events.name: server__data_Browserkey
events.comment: Ephemereal string used by the Game Server to identify this client session.

events.name: server__data_CharName
events.comment: CharName string to send to the Game Server when creating a character.

events.name: debug_cleartext_CharName
events.comment: Debugging value (decrypted charName). DELETE IN FINAL BUILD.

events.name: server__data_Username
events.comment: Username string to send to the Game Server to log in. (Encrypted.)

events.name: debug_cleartext_Username
events.comment: Debugging value (decrypted username). DELETE IN FINAL BUILD.

events.name: server__data_Password
events.comment: Password string to send to the Game Server to log in. (Encrypted)

events.name: debug__cleartext_Password
events.comment: Debugging value (decrypted password). DELETE IN FINAL BUILD.

events.name: server__data_RegisterAlias
events.comment: Alias string to send to the Game Server to register a new account.

events.name: server__data_RegisterUsername
events.comment: Username string to send to the Game Server to register a new account.

events.name: server__data_RegisterPassword
events.comment: Password string to send to the Game Server to register a new account. (Encrypted.)

events.name: debug__cleartext_RegisterPassword
events.comment: Debugging value (decrypted password). DELETE IN FINAL BUILD.

events.name: server__data_RegisterPassword2
events.comment: Password confirmation string to send to the Game Server to register a new account. (Encrypted.)

events.name: debug__cleartext_RegisterPassword2
events.comment: Debugging value (decrypted password confirmation). DELETE IN FINAL BUILD.

events.name: server__data_RegisterIRLName
events.comment: IRL Name string to send to the Game Server to register a new account.

events.name: server__data_RegisterEmail
events.comment: Email string to send to the Game Server to register a new account.

events.name: server__data_RegisterPhone
events.comment: Phone string to send to the Game Server to register a new account.

events.name: server__data_RegisterPromoBool
events.comment: True (1) if the user agrees to receive email promotion for the game on his registration email.

events.name: server__data_RegisterAgeBool
events.comment: Must be True (1) to register a new account. Indicates that the user certifies to be 13 y.o. or older.

events.name: server__data_RegisterContractBool
events.comment: Must be True (1) to register a new account. Indicates that the user agrees to the user agreement.

children.name: monster_group_hashid_composite
children.comment: Temporary variable to hold the MonsterGroup's hash ids as tokens.

actions.text: APPID and BK as usual (BK only for logging the user sessionkey)
